Detailed Description

a documented file containing stuff on frames.

AtlFrame.h contains the definitions for:

  • CFrameWndClassInfo
  • CFrameWindowImplBase
  • CFrameWindowImpl
  • CMDIWindow
  • CMDIFrameWindowImpl
  • CMDIChildWindowImpl
  • COwnerDraw
  • CUpdateUIBase
  • CUpdateUI
  • CDialogResize
as well as a bunch of macros for working with frames.

Definition in file atlframe.h.
